headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Panther Statue Headed to Cayo Perico
content:
Completing any Prep Mission for The Cayo Perico Heist reward you with the Orange Glow Shades, but reputable sources have it on pretty good authority that El Rubio is attempting to stash a bejeweled Panther Statue in his safe.

Scope out the security camera footage for a chance at walking away with a very heavy duffel indeed.

Completing The Cayo Perico Heist Finale at any point between now and December 1 will net you the Orange Skull Emissive Mask.
